channel.title: Need help with server
channel.description: using P16 blitz source and i need help fixing the mage and a problem with monsters + eating. The mage just doesnt work, even if you have runes. and the problem with monsters is sometimes when they get to low hp u cant hit them anymore u just hit 0s but they can still hit you. and the eating problem is you can only eat when ur not fighting.

item.title: Need help with server
item.dc:creator: @amafi amafi
item.description:
@amafi wrote:

using P16 blitz source and i need help fixing the mage and a problem with monsters + eating. The mage just doesnt work, even if you have runes. and the problem with monsters is sometimes when they get to low hp u cant hit them anymore u just hit 0s but they can still hit you. and the eating problem is you can only eat when ur not fighting.
